A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The initial reaction is that it was a very entertaining movie\, but a few minutes after the movie you realize the plot holes and lack of character development.  There is one storyline that is not even necessary.  We learned nothing about Snoke and his character needed more backstory for the payoff.  This movie is not as good as 'The Force Awakens' while being about 75% as derivative of the earlier movies.
